item.description:
At our last meetup Carlo was nice enough to share this event with us:

Cultural Night - Italian Travelogue (a talk or lecture) on Southern Italy. It's about an hour long narrated in English. I believe this is being sponsored by the members of The Sons of Italy.

Some refreshments will be served. Dinner will not be served here, so plan accordingly!

Admission is FREE. See below for directions!


This should a great night!
Speriamo di vederti!
Lorenzo

Directions to ST. James Church: Exit 23 from I-91 take a right i(f you coming from North) and go to the next major road ( Route 3) . Right on Rte 3, then take another right at a Sonoco Station.. Church is on left..... after crossing the bridges over the hiway( about half mile) (THIS ELM STREET).. From I-91 South at the exit light make LEFT turn and follow the same as above .
item.name: Cultural Night - Italian Travelogue (Southern Italy)
